title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“Friday night, shots were fired at two officers in Portsmouth, Va., more than 100 miles away....” [From the Los Angeles Times, June 2, 1984, Part 1,3. Submitted by Lani Oliveira, Whittier, California.]
